comments.body: Please use the camel_dict_to_snake_dict to fix the camelcase in the boto3 responses here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +149,153 @@            client=iam_cert, module=module, server_certificate_name=certificate_name)
    else:
        results = list_server_certificates(client=iam_cert, module=module, path_prefix=path_prefix)

    module.exit_json(**camel_dict_to_snake_dict(results))
